website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic VX2452mh is a reasonably priced 24-inch gaming monitor that delivers blur-free action without using a lot of power. Its color and grayscale performance are good, but not great, and it loses luminance and color fidelity when viewed from an angle.

customer_reviews.title: Awful monitor don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Awful monitor use it next to my LG flatron and the picture quality terrible. Locks blurred and out of focus. I've spent hours adjusting it's a complete waste of money. I will never buy ViewSonic again
customer_reviews.author: rcKeith

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitors, does what it says on the tin! NB: If you concider 1x monitor, you are able to have 3 inputs into the monitor and able to flick between systems, ie. Chromecast in HDMI input Main PC in D-Sub connector input Secondary PC in DVI connector input Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Muzza

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money indeed
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these for my custom set up PC gaming machine, nice clean crisp viewing with a multitude of settings, simple easy, great value, could not ask for more for the money thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joanne C

customer_reviews.title: you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I already one of those, its one of the best monitors out there....
customer_reviews.author: Kousik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and great design. Speakers quiet but what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Stonestreet

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the screen - it's good
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the screen - it's good, the only reason I didn't give it 5 Stars is because I found the speakers to be very poor...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my husband and he is thrilled with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a pc and Xbox one set up
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted top HD with a hdmi port and dvi. Perfect for a pc and Xbox one set up
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expert on monitor, but the monitor got one day earlier and works well. Good quality for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great monitor for the money, using as a 2nd monitor for my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It simply does exactly what i want , with no fuss or bother , Perfect
customer_reviews.author: topkat

customer_reviews.title: Good colours.
customer_reviews.text: bought this as an exterior monitor for a laptop. Excellent picture. Setup very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screen, this is the second one I have purchased from ViewSonic, they are an high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: David Hodson

customer_reviews.title: A good screen does what it says it was a present ...
customer_reviews.text: A good screen does what it says it was a present for my grandson and he is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: carol hill

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to play his Xbox One games on. The picture quality is very crisp and clear. He is really pleased with it. Only one problem, my youngest son wants one now.
customer_reviews.author: JennyL

customer_reviews.title: Unlucky
customer_reviews.text: Product came well packaged and in a timely manner from Amazon Warehouse. Unfortunately I could only get a picture on the top half the screen which was a big disappointment as it was a really nice monitor and I would much rather have kept it than send it back. On the part of the screen that did work the colors were very nice and vibrant compared to my old monitor. I would probably have given this monitor five stars if I had not being unlucky. This is the first item I have ever had to return to Amazon Warehouse after many years of use. Amazon was brilliant in handling the returns of the monitors so top marks there.
customer_reviews.author: Gugghi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, the screen quality is good, the response time is excellent. Works without any hassle. The wobbliness is something of a minor annoyance but not more than that. Good buy for the price, also arrived way before delivery date so a plus there. Does not come with an HDMI cable only DVI and VGA
customer_reviews.author: Jasuke

customer_reviews.title: works as expected and provides a really good picture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, works as expected and provides a really good picture for the price. the two input selection makes it easy to switch between two device.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to fit, lads of cable options supplied, good quality screen. I use mine with my laptop and have it as a split screen for documents, highly recommended, bought from Amazon and no problems re delivery or packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tell it like it is

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it for several weeks now and am very happy with it's performance
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time in several years that I have purchased a new monitor. I looked carefully at the available monitors and eventually settled on this one. I have been using it for several weeks now and am very happy with it's performance, looks and functionality. An excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stone

customer_reviews.title: the speakers are pretty poor though but what do you expect
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin, the speakers are pretty poor though but what do you expect.
customer_reviews.author: A J Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Monitor
customer_reviews.text: That was bad on my behalf, now that it's here it's awesome and has many different features that you can adjust or tweak.The monitor has superb Pixels and colour ratio. This monitor is top notch quality and I recommend it to anyone who seek a new Monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arthurs

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but...
customer_reviews.text: In past owned ViewSonic products and was happy with them so went again but this time they've disappointed me. The screen is good and overall design looks nice, but holder feels fragile, shakes a lot and tilts the screen forward. All in all, it's okay but don't think I'll be going for ViewSonic again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikk

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it arrived with a continental power cable but fortunately I was able to use the cable that came ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it arrived with a continental power cable but fortunately I was able to use the cable that came with my previous monitor. Also I inadvertently pressed the wrong buttons and changed the language setting to French and try as I might I can't get it back to English. The instruction aren't all that clear as how to set all the functions up. Mind you that could be down to my age and lack of skill. Apart from that it seems OK, picture quality is good and does what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Well they work well but have had two fail in ...
customer_reviews.text: Well they work well but have had two fail in less than a year, the first one was at the 45 day mark and there was only a 30 day warranty for a new replacement and I didn't want a refurbished one when mine was so new, so I went to the corporate office in chino and made them give me one which failed less than a year later so I've moved on...
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER E CONWAY

customer_reviews.title: Really great, sort of...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a nice size and is built well with typical ViewSonic quality. I chose this monitor since it had internal speakers, which is important in my situation. However, the speakers at 100% volume are super quiet and very muddy sounding. They aren't defective as far as I can tell. They are just really inadequate. If you don't needs the speakers, this is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Eames

customer_reviews.title: HDMI input is garbage & the thing falls apart like wheat crackers
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of junk I've ever wasted my money on. The HDMI input just, meh, stopped working one day. The audio input jack also doesn't work, it fell off my desk once and just fell apart like nothing was holding it together. There is also massive, maaaaaasssive screen delay, no matter what sort of HDMI cable you're using (I tried five different ones). Utter garbage, spend a few extra bucks on something better. You'll thank yourself for the investment.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Viewsonic - always a great, reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these monitors to replace older Viewsonic (Much older - almost 15 years!) monitors for general use during remote work and as a dual-monitor setup for my Mac Pro for music production. Great, non-glare screen, good resolution and flexible connectivity. I am not a fan at all of glossy screens and this fits the bill affordably and perfectly. For audio quality, the built-in speakers work fine for general use / conference calls but are a bit underpowered. However I did not originally plan on using the speakers at all until the recent COVID-19 situation, so being able to leverage them and give my headset a break was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: csquier

customer_reviews.title: Working Fine
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an old monitor for a dual monitor set-up, and was concerned with materials & construction quality and a defect-free display. So far, so good. No dead pixels or other defects noted, default settings out-of-the-box were fine, and there were no problems with monitor detection. Do be aware that there's VGA, DVI & HDMI but no DisplayPort connector (prevalent on graphics cards these days... To use as #2 monitor I needed a DP-to-HDMI cable).
customer_reviews.author: aprimeclient

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a good monitor. Very easy to install. I had to have it replaced because on the third day I got a line up the center of the screen, but other than that I am very pleased with the purchase. Thank goodness I purchased it from Amazon. They had a replacement on the way the same day I asked to have it replaced. Hopefully the replacement will not have the same problem. Replacement received and it is working just fine. Gotta love Amazon's quick response to problems.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent monitor for the price. The color is good and everything appears crisp and clean. I don't use it for gaming at all, so I can't comment on that. The internal speakers are very underpowered and tinny. I immediately disconnected them and used a pair of cheap external speakers, which sound much better. The stand allows you to change the angle of the monitor, but not its height. It also doesn't allow you to change the monitor from landscape mode to portrait mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Since 1998

customer_reviews.title: Notice that it does not come with HDMI cable
customer_reviews.text: This is a satisfactory monitor. It is not going to knock your socks off but you get what you are paying for. What I appreciate about it is that it has the VESA mount, it has the VIEWSONIC software that allows you to productively partition the screen. The picture is OK but my old LG monitor is more beautiful in the way it renders graphics in video games. I was not happy that it did not come with HDMI cable but they are easy to get. I expect I will get a lot of use out of this monitor. Maybe it will grow on me so I like it better, right now I am just not sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rdal

customer_reviews.title: Sound is terrible but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous model of this monitor, so when I needed a second one (which I use for work more than anything) I got this one. Picture is good, very adjustable. This one has buttons rather than touch controls, and I'm having a tough time getting both monitors to look the same because the menus are different. Because this was new I was going to use it as my primary screen and use my old one as the secondary screen, but the sound was so tinny and awful (hence 4 stars) that this is my secondary monitor. So if you don't need/want to use this for sound it will probably be great.
customer_reviews.author: KateCME

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixel in about 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great monitor for the price, but unfortunately, I already have a dead pixel on one of the units. This happened just after the 30 day Amazon window, so I called ViewSonic. Sadly, their policy requires that there be either 2 consecutive dead pixels, or there be any three dead pixels on a screen before any action is taken on their part. I use a high contrast theme, so this is particularly annoying for daily use. It's a good price for a low-latency monitor, but be aware of the policy and the risks.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca H.

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with a ViewSonic monitor
customer_reviews.text: Hands down THE best packaging of any product I've ever ordered. There wasn't even a blemish on the box. Everything arrived in perfect working order. No dead pixels and it was a simple setup. Check underneath the base for a screw to tighten your monitor to the base easily. I'm using the included 6 foot long VGA cable and I'm satisfied with my picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Koski

customer_reviews.title: Good Full HD monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a monitor I bought for a used Mac Mini. Works well enough to provide a decent quality picture. I wouldn't consider it for a gaming monitor and the controls are a bit cheesy but functional. I could also do without the glossy plastic surrounding the screen and the orange/ Blue LED activity light which is also distracting in low light. The monitor also has built in speakers but they sound weak and dynamic range is worse than some notebook speakers. Not worth the trouble to hook up, just buy a good pair or use headphones.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: First off the product got to my location days before the estimated delivery which was a plus due to my old monitor not working. Second the product it self has a great design and runs great with my Xbox one S. Since I'm in college I usually run a monitor and this one works perfect for space and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Byran H

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description...really hate this screen
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product is misleading. 1. The bezel is glossy. The screen is not. 2. "An arsenal of pre-set customizable visual modes keeps you ready for gaming and multimedia entertainment" There are no pre-set gaming modes. You need to make manual adjustments, and none of them decrease the fuzzyness of the display. 3. "MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio delivers sharp, crisp images" the images are not sharp nor crisp. If you adjust for sharpness, you get flicker. Whether working on documents or gaming, if yoiu want good resoluion, pay more and get a different display. This one does not live up to my previous experience with ViewSonic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best from the best
customer_reviews.text: These things are so good for the price I bought two. I have used Viewsonic monitors since the early 90's and I have never regretted a single purchase of which there's been many. Trouble free, simple installation and operation, bright vibrant image, excellent working life and easily repairable. They're maybe a few buck more than the average monitor, but totally worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Viewsonic Desktop Monitor #2
customer_reviews.text: I already own a Viewsonic monitor and this is the second one I've purchased because I use two monitors with my desktop PC. An old Dell monitor I used for the second one finally zapped out, so I decided to go with the same Viewsonic brand. I gave this monitor four stars because the screen on the original one has lost its brightness and now has a hazy look. I tried all the settings to correct it, but nothing worked yet. I'm hoping the new one won't experience the same thing. Overall I really like this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old HP w2207. Such a difference. HDMI, 1080P, speakers about the same - just OK, a fraction of the weight, a little smaller with the same screen size. I purchased a refurb from Viewsonic for $57. Like new. I might buy a 2nd for a hobby room. This is a gift price. The old one will be re-purposed as a spare or as a replacement shared view screen for the 24/7 network and media server arrangement in the basement. That one now uses an old 15 inch lcd monitor I found at a thrift shop for $10. It's well over 20 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, speakers SUCK
customer_reviews.text: For a monitor, this is pretty solid. There's a bit of color noise, so if that bothers you - then you shouldn't get this monitor. My biggest qualm with this monitor is its built-in speakers. They're absolutely terrible. The sound quality is awful and they're super quiet. You have to get external speakers or just use your computer's speakers because the ones that come with this monitor are TRASH
customer_reviews.author: Laila Polk

customer_reviews.title: ViewSonic VX2452MH 24" Screen
customer_reviews.text: When I run this Monitor in it's Native Resolution "1920 X 1080", I get black banding around the entire screen; and it is very annoying, and I can NOT correct this problem. I am forced to run in at a lower Resolution of "1600 X 900" to obtain full screen mode. I have it connected through an HDMI Cable, and I have tried various Refresh Rates and also tried tweaking it with the AMD VISION Control Center with no avail. NOT Really Happy At This Point.!.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.S..

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but sound is lacking
customer_reviews.text: As a desktop monitor that I occasionally game on, this monitor is great. The one feature I don't like though is the rear mounted speakers. I bought this model because it had speakers and I wanted to get away from the desktop speakers and the attendant wiring mess. However, rear mounted speakers in a desktop setting lack the required backstop for the sound to reflect off of. Rear mounted speakers work for wall mounted monitors because the sound bounces off the wall forward. Other than that, it's a great monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: We have these straight out the box at work so I bought one for the home office and bookmarking to buy one more for travel (I work on projects in different locations). Though it is large, in box its fine to travel. Well packed and worth the trouble! I didnt realize how much I lean in and slouch while using my laptop screen, even in tablet mode. SO much better! I have NO complaints but I am an Accountant not a gamer. So there's that. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ARealHumanBeing2020

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these monitors for my home office.
customer_reviews.text: I started teleworking more and needed to replace my old monitors because they were not bright enough. I use the 2 24" ViewSonic monitors to split screen presentations and spreadsheets. When I am on a conference call with my coworkers, I can see detailed information while they try to see the same presentations on their laptop screens. These monitors have paid for themselves several times over in the last 6 months I have been using them.
customer_reviews.author: Albert T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor and a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor to go with an existing ViewSonic 24" monitor. These monitors are great and for the price they can't be beat. I was hoping this one had a VGA connection on it, as that was the only other available port on my PC, and it turned out it doesn't. My DVI connection was already in use by my other monitor. Luckily this monitor has an HDMI port, which I was able to use. Simple setup and a great product. I highly recommend for anyone needing a good middle of the road monitor for normal daily use
customer_reviews.author: A. Etchechury

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is lovely and is as nice, practical as can be
customer_reviews.text: Replaces an aging 19" Viewsonic I've had for years. This monitor is lovely and is as nice, practical as can be. The colors are vivid, and it the settings are easy to use - once you find them (they're underneath the bezel). I feel as though I purchased a top-notch product for a very fair price. UPDATE 1/24/16 Darn, the monitor went south the other day. It started flickering, and displaying strange messages. Then it wouldn't start at all. To Viewsonic's credit, they are taking the monitor in for repair or replacement. I should know the results of their analysis in a few days. I'm still giving the monitor five stars as when it was working it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Flynn

customer_reviews.title: 4 year life!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Viewsonic that we purchased and this one lasted just over 4 years. Although my computer is on most days, a lot of time it is in sleep mode and the display is off. When I bought my new computer and switched it over to the new computer it would not display. The computer quit seeing the display and I couldn't even get the menu to come up. All it does is start, display "no signal" and go to sleep. I tried both the vga and dvi-d inputs with no joy. I will try a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Padre

customer_reviews.title: It's a ViewSonic
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best monitor I have ever used. I needed a second monitor for working at home. Unfortunately the ViewSonic I already own could only be matched exactly for $500.00. (brand new on Amazon, also sold with in a week or so) This was the updated version and is every bit as good as my first ViewSonic. Excellent monitors for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon's 01

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2nd monitor for business use. It was sold at a nice discount by ViewSonic, advertised as "works like new, looks like new." From the outer box to the internal packaging, the unit was brand new in appearance with all connector cables tightly wrapped with end caps in new plastic bags. I have no idea why it was sold for $96.99 instead of $129.99, but I definitely got a Great Deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Double G Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor to date
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor to date. Previous version we had of same 21.5" size and which we still use has a piece of junk, poorly design plastic switch, part of the bezel, that broke and thus now we have no way of turning off that monitor short of unplugging it. On calling Viewsonic their support was useless even for parts to buy a new bezel that has the plastic switch buttons. They need to improve their customer service. They seem to just want you to throw away the monitor and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: decent work monitor
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use it for anything else, just work. I suppose if you're playing the original wolfenstein or zork or something this could be a gaming monitor. But honestly, get a real gaming monitor if you're playing modern games. 22" 60hz is not good specs. For a work monitor I'd probably get a 24" monitor. Two 24" are good to work with but I'll live w/ this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nault

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous for turning a laptop into a desktop
customer_reviews.text: I have a laptop I love, but the screen is too small for the work I need to do. I'm a writer, and I need to see different documents and websites open at one time. This monitor works superbly -- beautiful display, responsive, and truly plug-and-play as long as you have the right cable required by your laptop. (For mine: 4K High-Speed HDMI Cable.) I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Joan PriceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always owned VeiwSonic monitors since CRT's where first used but the 19" I had was just to small for my old eyes. This new one is like WOW everything is so clear and big and I am not straining my eyes! Now mind you I am not a gamer so I can not comment on this monitors ability to handle the gaming world but out of the box it should work well for me. To be honest for the price I could not pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for a dual purpose-- to be used as a computer monitor and as a TV. Works great as a computer monitor, could be a little better for a TV. The picture didn't look quite as clear as a TV monitor (using DirecTV), but still looked okay. It would be nice if it had a remote control. In general, I was happy with it. At least it has speakers and VESA mounting holes on the back. It's surprising to see how many monitors out there don't have the mounting holes. Thankfully, Viewsonic still provides them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hookup

customer_reviews.title: speaker isn't good
customer_reviews.text: I just need a monitor with speaker for work. Nothing fancy and not for gaming. I listen to internet radio while I am on the computer but the speakers are bad. It sounds like in a tunnel. The first one was so bad that I have to return it. This second one is better but not as good as my previous monitor. I don't want to return it again. I will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I must have got a lemon :(
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Viewsonic monitors and never had a bad one even my 10 year old one still works great. Not so much on this one but maybe it was damaged some how. I'd still give Viewsonic as a whole a 5 star but this monitor must have got damaged some how on the way. Screen was too bright and adjusting didn't help, dark patterns at top of screen and bright bands at the bottom, screen quality was back to the 90's fussy and yellowish. I'm positive its damaged somehow and would buy another Viewsonic.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor because I will be working from home for the foreseeable future, and wanted a larger monitor (than just my laptop monitor). Overall, I think this is a great monitor for the price. I gave it four stars because of the stand - it is not well designed and is somewhat wobbly. If I bump my desk, the monitor will wobble. I also think it's difficult to change the settings. Other than that, I'm pleased with the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: CoverGirl82

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Sharp picture and so far, NO dead pixels! In my old AOC monitor, it had 2f dead pixels when I received it. AOC said that just 2 dead pixels were not enough to either fix or replace it. So, at the time I just had to live with it. It seemed that those 2 pixels were always somewhere noticeable, no matter what I was displaying. It was slower than this one too, not that you can see a 2ms response, but this ViewSonic monitor is fast, no lagging when playing some of the higher resolution games. Overall, would highly recommend this monitor for anyone on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: -BW from SD

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear, subpar audio
customer_reviews.text: The display is super sharp and looks great. The audio leaves much to be desired. I actually use the internal speaker on my mac mini (VESA mounted to the back), and the audio is much, much better. The audio is also not very loud at all. If you're looking for a display, this is great. If you're looking for a display with audio, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my tiny and outdated monitor I had at home. The picture is so clear and the larger screen has helped with my productivity. I'm not much of a gamer, but with how clear the picture is I imagine games would be AWESOME on this monitor. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Epple

customer_reviews.title: Poor Screen Quality
customer_reviews.text: Screen seems pretty washed out. My 5 year old Samsung (same price range) monitor is actually better. Tried adjusting the contrast, brightness, and color ... that helped somewhat but still not great. I'm not a gamer. So, can't speak to how well it performs for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Life Is Great

customer_reviews.title: PORCH PIRATES... COME GET ME!!!!!! I AM AN ELECTRONIC!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM MAD THAT THE MONITOR CAME IN IT’S ORIGINAL BOX, SHOWING IT IS CLEARLY AN ELECTRONIC FOR PORCH PIRATES TO STEAL!! I WAS SO DISAPPOINTED THAT AROUND THIS TIME OF YEAR, IT WASN’T IN ANOTHER BOX!!! MY HUSBAND OPENED THE DOOR TO GET HIS CHRISTMAS PREENT!!! IF IT WERE DROPPED OFF DURING THE DAY, IT WOULD HAVE BEEN STLOEN!!! I would have given this a 5 star rating!!!! DON’T EVER ORSER THIS IF IT IS A GIFT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: I only use this Monitor for just 3 days and stop working right away all I can see is white Screen so I need to Returned the item the next day Sorry but I can't Recommend this to people and I need to put my video review about this product to private to my youtube channel, that has about 4,543 Views and has got 323 Likes and 34 Disliked because my review was so good and now I need to explain to my 10,800 Subscribers that I am using a different Monitor now and not this
customer_reviews.author: junnel

customer_reviews.title: Clear but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This display was well reviewed and I thought it was nice until I brought home a Samsung display from work. White on the Samsung display is so much whiter it's distracting to have the two sitting next to each other. I messed with all applicable settings. The Viewsonic just can't do white as well as the Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: PghHLT

customer_reviews.title: Chunkier than many others
customer_reviews.text: This is a good monitor for the price, but it's a little chunkier than others in the same price range and a little heavier. The VESA mounts are also in a poor place, but still can work fine even for a multiple monitor stand. It's the top middle monitor in my picture, not that you can see much, better to compare the factory images of the device with other makes/models.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I remember when Viewsonic was an ultra premium brand of monitors that carried a stiff price. Then I forgot about them until fairly recently. My employer has over 100 22 inch Viewsonic monitors and will never buy anything else. After using them for the past 2 years, I decided to buy two of the 24 inch monitors for myself. They ware well made and have a vivid contrast. I am very happy with them. My only complaint is the clear plastic bit across the bottom. It makes them look cheap. Go all black and look professional instead.
customer_reviews.author: MMIII

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I had a old monitor I used for my work setup go out. So I ordered this to replace it. Need this size to fit in the space on the desk for it. Not sure for gaming or anything of the like if this one would be good, for for everyday use this is a nice monitor. Text is pretty sharp and colors look good. Does exactly what I needed here.
customer_reviews.author: Palico

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular quality for gaming and movies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an aging display and I've got to say, the image quality is phenomenal. In games, I the visual quality is superb, everything is crisp and clear, and the picture quality for movies is beautiful. Edit: After 1 weeks use, I am finding myself rather disappointed with the HDMI audio quality, the speakers are not as loud as they could be. My rate for this gaming monitor has been changed to 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Fast Service
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor - a picky office worker did not want to change monitors. (hers was small and square) She fought me, but I finally convinced her to try this. I quote "It is super! You know I can see things better and the larger size takes up more room on my desk, but its crisper and great!" Now in defense of all the other brands, her old monitor was at least 5 years old, but the prompt delivery and great price made this a no brainer. Thanks for a Great Produce
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have two identical monitors.
customer_reviews.text: I'm working from home now cuz of the COVID19 virus that out USA administration fell short of protecting the country. This second monitor looks fine for what I do and it is nice to have. Since we now have the highest rate of infections in the world (Thanks to Dumb Dumb Don Don) I guess I will be working from home for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eames

customer_reviews.title: beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: Received the first one and it had a dead pixel. Called Amazon and they sent me a replacement right away. Bad part is that when I opened my box, I received 3 air mattresses instead of the monitor. First guy told me to throw away the air beds and they would ship out another one. I called later on and talked to another lady at Amazon. She had the air beds picked up, felt guilty throwing them away anyways, straightened out everything and her customer service was great. New one is installed now, no issues. Beautiful screen. So far, I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: James V.

customer_reviews.title: Not 75hz on Native Res
customer_reviews.text: Would have been really nice to know before I purchased that the refresh rate at 1920x1080 is NOT 75hz. Misleading title. Will be reporting to Amazon. I couldn't get the colors to match my other monitors. The colors looked off on many applications and the sharpness was really soft. My lower resolution monitors looked clearer. You should really look for alternatives here on Amazon. I was able to find an IPS display for a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for gaming and play sims 4 on ultra setting. It's so nice! The graphics are beautiful. Even the screensavers are stunning. I couldn't have asked for a better monitor at such a great price point. If you've been on the fence about getting this, I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Monitor was dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Monitor showed a power light but would not display a screen. I tried multiple HDMI cables and computers with no luck. Unfortunately, seller provided an invalid return label and incorrect return instructions as well, so I ended up paying out of my own pocket to return this defective item.
customer_reviews.author: nerd glasses

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: We use these monitors at work. I bought the same exact model from Amazon and CDW. The color and brightness of one monitor is way better than the other. Since I'm using dual monitors the contrast is very apparent. One monitor is dull and lackluster and the other monitor has more vivid colors and sharper text. I wish I could convince my workplace to switch to another brand monitor (or at least let me choose my own).
customer_reviews.author: Killinmesmalls

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: Got this monitor as a gift from my wife so that I could enjoy playing COD which I've played for a dozen years or more. It works great for me and is a big improvement over my previous monitor, just too bad my skills didn't improve too, lol. I would have given this a 5 star rating if it had better built in speakers. The speakers that come with it are lousy so know this, if you buy this monitor, you need to get speakers too! I'm just sayin'.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: The sound is not very good/ The stand is very big.
customer_reviews.text: It has pretty good quality, and it comes with basically every port you could need other then the HDMI cable, including VGA and DVI. The sound quality is not very good as it is very quiet, and not good at all for music. The stand is also very big and takes up a lot of my desk although I like that I can mount it onto my wall. Sorry for mainly pointing out the negatives but I wish I knew these things before buying, so I figured I may as well tell others.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with this monitor. I got the gaming monitor to get a better picture, and it shows. Graphics are stunning. Nicely adjustable as to color, contrast and such, but I wish I could adjust it to more extreme settings at times. I still can't figure out how to adjust the positioning of the picture. These adjustments don't seem to "take." Maybe they don't "take" in real time and only do so after saving the settings. Probably user error. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 3-inputs with built-in switching mechanism for two computers
customer_reviews.text: Have always been a ViewSonic fan, but this model is the best yet. HDMI, DVI and VGA, and with a button push, I can switch from one computer to another, while using just one monitor.. I look forward to its historically long lifespan of trouble-free hours with this new display. Life just got easier. Thank you, ViewSonic!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy777

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So excited to watch movies on this in my dorm room -- and do homework with all my windows open between my laptop screen and this monitor. Easy to set up, does not come with an HDMI cable, does come with two other VGA-looking things (my laptop only uses HDMI, so). Great for $130!!! impressed with how crisp it is for how cheap it is. definitely fuzzier than my laptop screen, but still looks great. Not a touch screen, in case you thought it was. speakers are kind of quiet, but I connect to a bluetooth speaker set anyway. The stand it kind of large, it takes a circular region of your desk that is around 10-inches in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same monitor I have at work, so to have it at home for remote work is really nice. I like the various ports because it gives me some flexibility when switching between my work laptop and personal laptop. When I'm on my work laptop, I am using the HDMI cable and when on my Macbook Pro, I am using the VGA cable. So perfect! Super fast shipping and fits my needs!
customer_reviews.author: MommaCI

customer_reviews.title: Good value for work from home
customer_reviews.text: I've loved View Sonic in the past and these are good monitors. I don't think this model is really designed around gaming, so I didn't rate it as such. I bought these for working from home and they have been great for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: GregN

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Performance
customer_reviews.text: Incredible contrast, clarity, and color performance right out of the box. No dead pixels. Great 1080 performance for my Cable TIVO HD system service on an HDMI connector, and my desktop PC/BD-DVD on the DVI-D. Only minor 'room adjustment' toning down of the factory set contrast and brightness was necessary, along with adjusting for best 'Clear Type' on PC Font settings. The integrated speakers are acceptable, though I use audio out to an enhanced audio system, or headphones most of the time. Although all manual (comparison to an HDTV remote), the OSD menu is easy to use, and source selection is pretty straight forward. Got a great PC monitor, and a 1080 HDTV in the bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Tomintx

customer_reviews.title: Cheap monitor and it shows.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor does not have HDMI input, just RGB. The plastic material is cheap feeling and is not higher quality as other monitors that I have from HP, LG nor Samsung. The brightness of the monitor is less than all other monitors of similar size. The only good thing about the monitor is that it is cheap, and cheap quality and performance shows that cheap price point. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works well with a few caveats.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Some people might see that as a selling point but the stand feels flimsy to me... Not really a huge problem since I dont see a need to move it often. Picture is crystal clear with no dead pixels which is important to me. Auto-detect signal doesn't work properly sometimes and there isn't a setting to select a default input. A minor inconvenience. The menu however is easy to navigate and quick to use. May not be a good choice for graphics work, but for watching movies and playing video games this is a great value for an economical price.
customer_reviews.author: AbleTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A two years review
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on May 2015. Color fades out after one and a half year. I have two monitors (two different brands) on my desk. Early 2017, I was surprised when I dragged YouTube video from one monitor to the other and found the problematic color accuracy. It used to work so well. It has three year warranty. It's getting even worse now. I am contacting customer service to have it repaired. I wouldn't recommend you buy this monitor for a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Yiqing Lan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bad monitor for the price. My only complaint is the colors are not very deep. Compared to the laptop I use for work there is a noticable difference in the depth of the color. It is almost like there is a whitish hue that prevent the colors from really popping. I tried messing around with the color settings, but still couldn't get it to match. If you need a second or third HD monitor just to be able to get more work done this should do the trick though
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Changed the product a bit
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor for the money. This is the second 22” viewsonic monitor I have purchased. The other is 4 years old and still works great. However, I paired the new with the old and while I do have dual monitors now, they changed the style and one sits higher than the other which is slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conover

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice monitor. I work from home and have been using it for a couple of months now. I purchased this monitor after getting headaches nearly daily from my old one. I can tell a huge difference - no headaches and less eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: mslissap

customer_reviews.title: A sharp picture easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Viewsonic VX2452 as the second monitor for my Apple Mac. It comes really close to matching the clarity of my Mac. I use it mainly for my business coaching business. I tried several other monitors before choosing this one. None of them stacked up to how well this monitor works with my Mac. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: R H. and L. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Average Monitor, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor to be a second display along side a similar viewsonic that was purchased about 4/5 years ago. The older viewsonic (while a higher model) is brighter, crisper, and supports a higher resolution (nearly twice of this model). Because of this and the set up of windows 10 I am now left with 2 monitors at an average resolution. Wish I would have spent more. I would recommend this monitor if you are looking for something cheap as your only monitor or if you are buying a pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: I trust viewsonic
customer_reviews.text: Have trusted this brand for years. I had two 21" for dual screen. Had replace one with this model and replaced the other. Easy. I need both vga and hdmi. I've got a laptop from work and I just plug the hdmi cable from that into one and can switch back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: **** ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC FOR THE PRICE ****  Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Take a look at the detail in this photo on the pink screen! I purchased this monitor after purchasing a Vizio 24" from Walmart for the same price. NIGHT AND DAY. I use this monitor as an 'extra' with my large graphics monitor and my Mac. I use this monitor with Apple TV and an HDMI cable to the Apple TV so I can connect it to my Mac wirelessly. It started right up with BEAUTIFUL display quality. If you want to save a few bucks on a monitor, BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: OroPreto

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for a great price. Dang!! Shipped fast and easy to open box. Didn't come with a CD, but no prob, since I just plugged and played. Crisp display. Good on the eyes and the settings are fairly intuitive. (manual settings on the bottom right of monitor). Used a DVI to HDMI adapter for my late 2012 Mac Mini to connect. Comes with a separate audio cable. I would definitely recommend for a simple and straightforward monitor for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Crisp and clean and bright at 1920x1080. Colors good. I have it hooked up to an Intel m5 Compute Stick. The only knock is that the speakers are only 2W and tinny, but unlike other monitors in its class & price range, at least it has speakers, and this deficiency isn't enough to knock it down a star. .Because the m5 compute stick plugs directly into the monitor's HDMI port and there is no other audio out on the compute stick, HDMI is the only way to get audio out. The monitor It does have stereo out connectors for hooking it up to external speakers. It comes with HDMI, DVI, and VGA cables.
customer_reviews.author: John Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Buy the warranty, you'll need it.
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY !! Amazon needs to stop selling this product, 2 monitors in less than 8 months is ridicules. GARBAGE, of course Amazon wont back it because itsover 30 days since purchase BS. Maybe time to dump Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nuvopatriot

customer_reviews.title: ViewSonic HDMI Presentation Monitor
customer_reviews.text: ViewSonic is our Go to Monitor for Presentations. Been a fan favorite of ViewSonic since Comdex days. Lighweight & portable. Low dead pixel policy. Has VESA Mount & automatically senses output. Our setup: From PC - HDMI out to HDMI Splitter to Monitor & HDMI Switch which connects to InFocus HD Projector. HDMI Splitter prevents Monitor from blinking when switching HDMI inputs on HDMI Switch. Hope this tidbit of info helps! If NVIDIA Video cards are any indication of up and coming video technologies, we'll be looking for Display Port Monitors which right now would have to be ASUS or else get Display Port to HDMI adapters. Hello ViewSonic! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: BuildOrBuy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor for gaming. I have a Nintendo Switch hooked up via HDMI and a gaming computer hooked up via DVI and an audio line. It works very well with both. I have a set of speakers hooked to the monitor and get audio from both systems without any problem. The picture is great, response time, color range, backlight are all excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

product_meta.title: ViewSonic VX2252MH 22-inch Full HD Entertainment Monitor (60Hz, 2ms, 1080p, Game Mode, VGA, DVI, HDMI, 2x 2W Speakers) - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:22-inch Full HDViewSonic's VX2252mh is a 22-inch (21.5-inch viewable) Full HD, glossy-finish display that offers the ultimate visual experience for gaming and multimedia entertainment. The VX2252mh features ClearMotiv II technology that delivers 2ms ultra-fast response time for blur-free images during extreme gaming, and an ultra-high 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for sharp, crisp color performance for enjoying movies. Integrated D-sub, DVI and HDMI inputs provide flexible connectivity for high-definition multimedia devices and gaming consoles, and dual built-in 2W stereo speakers complete the package for multimedia enjoyment. With a VESA-mountable design, the VX2252mh offers flexible mounting options for any of your gaming and video entertainment needs. A 3-year limited warranty and the industry's best pixel performance policy make the VX2252mh a great long-term investment.

BOX CONTAINS


LCD Display 
Power Cable 
VGA Cable 
DVI Cable 
Audio Cable 
Quick Start Guide
feature_bullets: STUNNING RESOLUTION AND CLARITY: Full HD 1920x1080 resolution for unbelievable pixel-by-pixel image performance. With a 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio

BLUR-FREE ACTION: With 2ms response time, delivers smooth images without streaking, blurring or ghosting. This blazing-fast response time is perfect for the most graphic-intense gaming needs, and just as great for watching sports or action movies.

GAME MODE: provides enhanced visibility and detail by highlighting dark scenes without over-exposing the bright areas. Seeing your opponents’ every move, even in the darkest scenes of a video game, is easy with our preset gaming mode.

FLICKER-FREE VIEWING: Rather than using Pulse Width Modulation that continuously turns the LED backlight on and off, ViewSonic flicker-free displays use DC modulation backlights that maintain a steady stream of direct current power for improved eye comfort

CONSERVE MORE ENERGY: ViewSonic’s proprietary Eco-mode function offers Optimize and Conserve modes based on the users’ working scenarios to reduce display brightness and conserve energy to prolong the monitor's lamp life, improving your return on investment
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VX2252MH supports laptops, PCs, and Macs with HDMI, DVI, and VGA inputs
BOX CONTAINS: LCD Monitor, Power Cable, DVI cable, VGA cable, and Audio Cable
